well, this ship wont happen in the manga. IRL equivalent... well, Ura liked Deku from the start. If something like this happen it would probably be Ura scratching a itch. But let's be serious: girls either like the bad boys or the good boys. Ura like the good boys. Fan of this ship are those that think that girl are for a**hole cuz, while Deku can cry from time to time?, Baku dont have a shred of humanity BUT only anger issue. Someone talked how "Deku had it simple" while "Baku had to train". Sure, cuz Deku didnt' try to get his power to blossom working out. And then he had less than six month so overclass Baku physical form. Simple, sure. Like breathing air on the moon without equipment. Still, you have to give points where they belong: still a better love story than Twilight. And a more credible ship than Baku(genderbender)Deku.

@sauron006 Yeah, I kinda do. Everything he's done since this point has been influenced by All Might, it's not limited to Bakugo. Wearing a smile on your face in the face of danger, self-sacrificing nature: put other people's needs above his own and save as many people as he can and is always willing to lend a helping hand.  Moreso than anything, he wants to get stronger so that he can become a suitable candidate as the next Symbol of Peace, Bakugo is more like a test-marker for that. If he can surpass Bakugo, then he'll know that he has truly risen to the top because as you said, while All Might is a distant figure, Bakugo is the closest person he thinks as amazing. But he uses Bakugo to see how far he's come as a hero because Bakugo has always been at the top while Midoriya has always been at the bottom. Surpassing Bakugo means that he has truly reached the top and his drive has always been to be the super cool hero All Might has been. These are traits that Uraraka admires about him.

How does he use Full Cowling in action? He mimicked Bakugo. Why does he want to get stronger? Because he wants to surpass Bakugo. I emphasize with Bakugo, just not his anger issues. This guy's sole ambition is to be the #1 hero, he idolizes All Might (probably more than deku) then along comes this autistic fag who follows you around, you don't want him there because he's super lame and cries a lot. He even embarrassed you in front of your friends. Turns out the fucker wants to be a hero with no quirk! He keeps following you despite you beating him up and telling him to go kill himself. He even calls you his friend. But whatever, kids got no quirks, Bakugo will go to UA where all might went and finally start his hero journey. And even better he won't see deku again because he's a useless crybaby not a hero. Then in swoops deux ex machinae and All Might gives Deku his power for failing to defeat a villain and putting himself in unnecessary danger. He becomes the center of attention and steals your hero's attention and dreams. He even names himself "useless'
